attributes.action: re-look at the Schools National Curriculum to include the study of Pre-Christian Religion in Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these days of social acceptancy in all aspects of life, we feel that the National Curriculum is outdated and prejudiced with regard to Religious Studies in our countries' Schools. Paganism pre-dates Christianity but our School Children are led to believe otherwise. We urge you to bring the National Curriculum up to date, and encourage the study of the Ancient Religion of England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
